Text: Charing Cross ( ) denotes the junction of Strand, Whitehall and Cockspur Street, just south of Trafalgar Square in central London.

Text: Charing Cross:  It gives its name to several landmarks, including Charing Cross railway station, one of the main London rail terminals.
